snippet.title: Initial D: Special Stage (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Initial D: Special Stage (PS2) - Car: Toyota Trueno GT-APEX (AE-86) FR - Track: Myogi

Initial D Special Stage contains a story mode that allows the player to reenact racing scenes from the Initial D manga series, as well as several new courses that's not seen in the arcade versions of the game. In one of these courses, Shomaru went on to appear in Initial D Arcade Stage Ver.3.
